title: Canada's Iron Curtain | Guests: Ezra Levant & Artur Pawlowski | 10/19/21
description:
Over 100,000 guns are now reported as "lost" in Australia. Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins with Pastor Artur Pawlowski to discuss the legal scrutiny Artur has endured for being outspoken against COVID regulations. Glenn discusses the fundamental changes President Biden is looking to implement in the economy. Former State Trooper Robert LaMay joins Glenn to discuss leaving the police force after over 20 years because of the vaccine mandate. Greg Morris joins to discuss the mask mandate that the Dallas Diocese Catholic Schools announced and the threat of expelling children whose parents oppose the mandate. Glenn and Stu discuss the GMA interview with Christopher Steele regarding his infamous debunked Steele dossier.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
